item.title: 10 Rules for Profitable Self Discipline
item.description: It was a sunday evening and we were discussing random topics among our friends. One of the topics that came up, was on how to communicate effectively? or more precisely, how to discuss crucial topics, without either one being offended. This discussion, reminded me of an old yet, timeless speech by Napoleon Hill on 10 Rules for Profitable Self Discipline. The 10 Rules for Profitable self discipline are 1. Keep cool when others get hot.
